titleStmt.title: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 9: Introductory Rite for Miracles of Mary (Mäqdəmä Tä'amər), from Mu'älläqa

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

msIdentifier.idno: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 9: Introductory Rite for Miracles of Mary (Mäqdəmä Tä'amər), from Mu'älläqa

summary.p: Fol. 13r: States the scribe's name is Gäbrä Śəllase.
Perhaps the manuscript includes only the introductory rite because they intended to add the Miracles of Mary later.
References: See references listed for manuscript no. 8. See also, Budge, Mary, pp. xlvi-liv.
